progress.total: Total number of sentences to be judged

login.login_id: You are logged in with ID

sentences.sentences_judged: The sentences below have been completely judged by you. You can change your responses here. Changes are saved automatically.
sentences.sentence_todo: Please judge the sentences below. Sentences with a red label are not judged completely yet. When the label turns green, you judgements will be saved.

question.answerable_explanation: Check this box when a sentence is not in English, it is incomprehensible or it only contains data like an ISBN or price.
question.sentence_unanswerable: For this sentence these questions are impossible to answer.

alert.narrative_no_emo: Emotional impact cannot be absent when narrative feelings are expressed.
alert.style_no_emo: Emotional impact cannot be absent when feelings w.r.t. style are expressed.
alert.valence_no_emo: Feelings cannot be positive or negative when there is no emotional impact.

info.sentence_done: Sentences with sufficient judgements are judged by at least 3 persons.

thanks.contact: If you would like to be kept updated on this research, let us know. Send an email to peter.boot@huygens.knaw.nl and/or marijn.koolen@di.huc.knaw.nl.
